DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether modified "spray as you go" technique using the Enk Fiberoptic Atomizer Set during awake fiberoptic intubation is more comfortable for the patient.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Two Different Types of "Spray as You go" Technique for Awake Fiberoptic Intubation
